species.name: raticate
descriptions: A RATICATE’s sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
Gnaws on anything with its tough fangs. It can even topple concrete buildings by gnawing on them.
Its disposition is far more violent than its looks would suggest. Don’t let your hand get too close to its face, as it could bite your hand clean off.
Its hind feet are webbed, so it’s a strong swimmer. It can cross rivers and sometimes even oceans.
Its rear feet have three toes each. They are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: hustle
abilities.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.
